Package Main

Class HelperMethods

java.lang.Object
Main.HelperMethods
public class HelperMethods extends Object
Created class HelperMethods.java

This class contains static methods the application uses throughout.

Author:
Jamie Barbour-Moore

      public static boolean exitDialog()

      Returns:
      true if the user confirms to exit

      header - the dialog's header
      message - the dialog's message

    • backDialog

      public static boolean backDialog()
      This method runsr the application's back dialog.
      Returns:
      true if the user confirms to go back

    • confirmDialog

      public static boolean confirmDialog(String title, String header, String message)
      This method allows the simple creation of confirm dialogs
      Parameters:
      title - title to be displayed in confirm dialog
      header - header to be displayed in confirm dialog
      message - message to be displayed in confirm dialog
      Returns:
      boolean of the user's choice

    • infoDialog

      public static void infoDialog(String title, String header, String message)
      This method allows the simple creation of an information alert for the user.
      Parameters:
      title - title to be displayed in information alert
      header - header to be displayed in information alert
      message - message to be displayed in information alert

    • formatDateTimeDisplay

      public static String formatDateTimeDisplay(LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      This method format's a LocalDateTime to display for the user. It assumes the LocalDateTime is in UTC and the output is in System Default.
      Parameters:
      localDateTime - The localDateTime to be displayed (UTC)
      Returns:
      The String with the date and time information in System Default

    • getDateTimeForLocation

      public static LocalDateTime getDateTimeForLocation(LocalDateTime localDateTimeUTC)
      This method converts a localDateTime from utc to the system default.
      Parameters:
      localDateTimeUTC - the localdatetime in zone UTC
      Returns:
      the localdatetime in zone system default

    • getDateTimeForUTC

      public static LocalDateTime getDateTimeForUTC(LocalDateTime localDateTimeHere)
      This method converts a localDateTime from the system default to utc.
      Parameters:
      localDateTimeHere - the localdatetime in zone system default
      Returns:
      the localdatetime in zone utc

    • formatDateTimeDisplay

      public static String formatDateTimeDisplay(Timestamp timestamp)
      This method formats a timestamp to display for the user. It assumes the timestamp is in UTC and the output is in System Default.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - The timestamp to be displayed (UTC)
      Returns:
      The String with the date and time information in System Default

    • convertLocalTimeFromEST

      public static LocalTime convertLocalTimeFromEST(LocalTime localTimeEst)
      This method converts a local time from system default to EST. EST is the time zone the company's business hours use.
      Parameters:
      localTimeEst - the localTime object in EST
      Returns:
      a local time object in System Default

    • convertLocalTimeToEST

      public static LocalTime convertLocalTimeToEST(LocalTime localTimeSystemDefault)
      This method converts a local time from system default to EST. EST is the time zone the company's business hours use.
      Parameters:
      localTimeSystemDefault - the localTime object in system default
      Returns:
      a local time object in EST

    • exportPersonListToCSV

      public static boolean exportPersonListToCSV(List<Person> people, String location)
      This method allows the export of a list of people to a csv file.
      Parameters:
      people - the list of people to be exported
      location - the location of the csv file
      Returns:
      true if the export succeeds

    • exportAppointmentListToCSV

      public static boolean exportAppointmentListToCSV(List<Appointment> appointmentList, String location)
      This method allows the export of a list of appointments to a csv file.
      Parameters:
      appointmentList - the list of appointments to be exported
      location - the location of the csv file
      Returns:
      true if the export succeeds

    • generateHash

      public static String generateHash(String password, String salt)
